name: Nortenos Taqueria
text:
TACOS

TACOS .............................................. 4.95 EA
ALL TACOS COME ON HAND PRESSED CORN TORTILLAS WITH: ONION, LIME, CILANTRO, PINEAPPLE + CHOICE OF SALSA: ROJA (RED), VERDE (GREEN), OR PICANTE (HOT)

CARNITAS DE PUERCO (BRAISED PORK SHOULDER)
TINGA DE POLLO (SPICY PULLED CHICKEN)
BARBACOA DE RES (BRAISED BEEF) [Add $0.75]
VEGETARIANA (LENTILS)

SHRIMP TACOS ............................ 7.50 EA
SPICY MARINATED SHRIMP, PICO DE GALLO, AND MONTEREY JACK CHEESE IN A FLOUR TORTILLA. SERVED WITH AVOCADO CREMA (1 PER ORDER)

FISH TACOS ................................... 6.50 EA
LIGHTLY BATTERED COD, PICO DE GALLO, JALAPEÑO, CUCUMBER, AND AVOCADO ONION SALAD. TOPPED WITH AVOCADO CREMA AND SERVED ON A HANDMADE CORN TORTILLA (1 PER ORDER)

BIRRIA TACOS ................................ 17.25
THREE BIRRIA BEEF TACOS LOADED WITH MONTEREY JACK CHEESE. DIPPED IN OUR BEEF BROTH AND FRIED UNTIL CRISPY GOLDEN BROWN. SERVED WITH A 4OZ CUP OF BEEF DIP, FILLED WITH ONIONS AND CILANTRO AND A SIDE LIME.

QUESADILLAS

ROASTED POBLANO PEPPERS, SAUTÉED ONIONS, CHEESE + SIDE OF AVOCADO CREMA AND CHOICE OF SALSA: ROJA (RED) , VERDE (GREEN), PICANTE (HOT)

PORK, CHICKEN, OR BEAN ... 13.75
BEEF ............................................. 14.75

BIRRIA BURGER

4 OZ BEEF BURGER, TOPPED WITH POBLANOS, ONIONS, BIRRIA BEEF, MELTED MONTEREY JACK CHEESE. TOPPER WITH IUS ROMA BAKERY BUN. SERVED WITH A SIDE OF CHIPS AND SALSA.

13.75

TAQUITOS

'3 PER ORDER' ROLLED, CRISP FRIED CORN TORTILLA FILLED WITH CHOICE OF PROTEIN AND TOPPED WITH SHREDDED LETTUCE, PICO DE GALLO, AND CREMA. MADE

PORK, CHICKEN, OR LENTIL... 13.75
BEEF .............................................. 14.25

TOSTADAS

FRIED CORN TORTILLAS WITH YOUR CHOICE OF PROTEIN (BEEF, CHICKEN, PORK, OR REFRIED BEAN) AND TOPPED WITH SHREDDED LETTUCE, PICO DE GALLO, CREMA AND CILANTRO

7

TORTAS
MEXICAN SANDWICHES ON ROMA BAKERY BUNS

PORK BELLY ............................. 15.00
CUCUMBERS, PICKLED ONIONS, CHIPOTLE, BBQ SAUCE, ROASTED GARLIC JALAPEÑO AIOLI

FRIED CHICKEN .......................... 15.00
LETTUCE, TOMATO, PICKLED RED ONION, ROASTED GARLIC JALAPEÑO AIOLI

'CHEESE STEAK' ................... 16.50
BRAISED BEEF, ROASTED POBLANO PEPPERS, ROASTED ONION, CHEESE, ROASTED GARLIC JALAPEÑO AIOLI

SHAREABLES
TAPAS STYLE SHARED PLATES

BRAISED PORK BELLY BITES ....... 14.50
BRAISED PORK BELLY SERVED ON A SLICE OF CUCUMBER TOPPED WITH PICKLED ONIONS AND CREMA

CHICHARRONES ......................... 13.75
SLOW ROASTED CRISPY PORK BELLY SERVED WITH LETTUCE, PICKLED ONIONS, AND JALAPEÑO AIOLI

ALITAS (WINGS) ................ [16]LB | [28]2LB
FRIED CHICKEN WINGS. AVAILABLE IN:

PINEAPPLE HABANERO
CHIPOTLE HONEY
VALENTINA
TAJIN
SALT, PEPPER & LIME
SHUMKA DUST

NACHOS ....................................... 15.50
FRIED CORN TORTILLA CHIPS TOPPED WITH CHEESE, PICO DE GALLO, CREMA AND CHOICE OF PROTEIN: PORK, CHICKEN BEAN OR BEEF (ADD $3 FOR BEEF)

ENCHILADAS

THREE CORN TORTILLAS STUFFED WITH CHICKEN AND CHEESE, COVERED IN SALSA ROJA AND TOPPED WITH MONTEREY JACK CHEESE AND CREMA.

16.50

BIRRIA RAMEN

RAMEN NOODLES COOKED IN OUR BEEF BROTH WITH BRAISED BEEF AND SHREDDED CHEESE, TOPPED WITH ONIONS, AND CILANTRO

17.50

SIDES

ESQUITES ...................................... 6.00
ROASTED CORN, CREMA, PARMESAN CHEESE, ROASTED JALAPEÑO, CHILI POWDER

PAPAS AL HORNO ..................... 6.00
SPICED ROASTED POTATOES TOPPED WITH CREMA AND PICO DE GALLO

CORN & BLACK BEAN SALAD .... 6.00
CORN, BLACK BEANS, CUCUMBERS, RED ONION, CARROTS, CHILI LIME VINAIGRETTE

CHIPS & DIP ................................. 5.00
TORTILLA CHIPS WITH CHOICE OF ANY SALSA, PICO DE GALLO, OR AVOCADO CREMA

TAMALES ..................................... 7.25
CORN MASA STUFFED WITH CHICKEN AND CHEESE AND CARROTS. STEAMED IN A BANANA LEAF AND SERVED WITH YOUR CHOICE OF SALSA (ONE PER ORDER)

EXTRAS
ADD ON TO ANY ORDER

small large
SALSA ................... 1.50 2.50
PICO DE GALLO .......... 1.75 3.00
AVOCADO CREMA ........ 2.25 3.75
SOUR CREAM ........... 2.00 3.25
CHEESE ................. 2.25 3.75
PICKLED JALAPEÑO ................ 2.25

VISIT US ON SOCIAL MEDIA OR IN RESTAURANT FOR MORE SPECIALS!
